TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed AsyncContentLoadedState extends System.Enum

summary.span: Contient des valeurs qui spécifient l’état du contenu en cours de chargement dans un élément de contenu.

span.span: Contains values that specify the state of the content being loaded into a content element.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Automation.AsyncContentLoadedState Beginning = int32(0)

summary.span: Spécifie que le chargement asynchrone du contenu dans l’élément [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] commence.

span.span: Specifies that asynchronous loading of the content into the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element is beginning.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Automation.AsyncContentLoadedState Completed = int32(2)

summary.span: Spécifie que le chargement asynchrone du contenu dans l’élément [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] est terminé.

span.span: Specifies that asynchronous loading of the content into the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element is complete.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Automation.AsyncContentLoadedState Progress = int32(1)

summary.span: Spécifie que le chargement asynchrone du contenu dans l’élément [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] est en cours.

span.span: Specifies that asynchronous loading of the content into the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element is in progress.

summary.span: Les fournisseurs UI Automation doivent spécifier que le pourcentage d’achèvement, pour que les applications clientes connaissent la quantité de contenu restante.

span.span: UI Automation providers should specify the percent complete so that client applications will know how much more content remains.
